official_title: Resolved, that during the remainder of the Ninety-third Congress, the Committee on Armed Services shall be composed of fourth-four members, and the Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce shall be composed of forty-four members.

summary.text: Provides that during the remainder of the 93d Congress, the House Committee on Armed Services shall be composed of forty-four members, and the House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce shall be composed of forty-four members.

titles.title: Resolved, that during the remainder of the Ninety-third Congress, the Committee on Armed Services shall be composed of fourth-four members, and the Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce shall be composed of forty-four members.
